IntroText: I knew you would come back.|I need to explain some things to you.
Hey there, you must be the new girl.
It's about this club and also about Natalie.
This is the college's Kinbaku Club.|Your welcome to stay for the evening.
It's about this club and also a bet Natalie made.
I'll explain a bit about this club.
For a start, the college thinks this club is about|"Cultural art forms, practical skills and exercise".
Yeah officially, a few of the teachers know better.|Also it's not just Kinbaku with ropes.
The club is very inclusive and we use|a wide range of equipment and techniques.
No, there are standards and consent.  The club|will internally discipline anyone who goes too far.
Even so we tend to use safe words such as 'Banana',|just to make sure everyone is OK and enjoying it.
Natalie could have saved herself a lot of|trouble quite easily.  Oh and have a complimentary rope.
She would be tied up the whole time given the choice.|I've told her to have an evening without for once.
You have some nerve,|turning up here after what you've done.
My FRIEND is recovering after what YOU did to her.
Her next class was Math and she was|discovered afterwards by a furious Mildred.
I'm sure you will have no trouble|getting over this practical joke then.
